item.description:
Hello ladies and gentleman!! Next Thursday night we will be heading out to The Sports Bar in North Windham recommended by one of our members who is the man Kyle! Respect to Kyle for recommending a fun night out there since we are a Connecticut group that goes everywhere in the state. Let's all plan to be at this venue for 9:45p.m. to 10:00p.m.
You can bring your friends, family, or significant others. The more the merrier! I've never been there myself so let's check it out. Hope all of you are doing well plus we all look forward to having fun and meeting new members. If you have any questions you can email me or call me at 860-919-9782. Till next week enjoy life and have fun : ).
item.how_to_find_us: Call or text me 860-919-9782. You can also see what I look like in my pictures so you can just look for me as well.
item.name: Thursday Night at The Sports Bar In North Windham!
